body:
Hi everyone 

Sorry I posted this again, I accidentally posted it as an archive. Please don't lock this one

I thought today I would do another Forum game cus i really enjoy these.
Today i wanted to play a game where we have to say the first words that
comes into your brain when you think of a well known (or non well known) 
country or city and then comment another country or city, and so on....

E.G

If the word was China

I would say. . . red lanterns!

(and then comment another country or city)

LETS START THE GAME :

I'll start, Mexico

title: -=+FORUM GAME+=- First Word

replies.body: U gotta say another city or country

replies.body:
I'm sorry to say but there has been a topic similar to this in the past. If you want, you can start a new word by naming a country. :D

http://avicus.net/forums/dfad1c72b

Locking.
